logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (313800) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (313800) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Thrombotic microangiopathy events, based on diagnosis codes from Reynolds AJKD 2003 and Perkins NDT 2006
